BTW It would be much easier (for me) if I could send directly the System.Windows.Forms.Keys ... instead of the need to implement a big Keys<->VirtualKeyCode translation...

ok - sorry, found it by myself ;-)

1) PageUp & PageDown are called PRIOR and NEXT
2) The underlying values are more or less the same - so casting will be the way to go.
